subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Russian team Metallurg Magnitogorsk said yesterday that it would go to court to seek compensation from the Pittsburgh Penguins after the disappearance of their best player, Evgeni Malkin.
snippet: The Russian team Metallurg Magnitogorsk said yesterday that it would go to court to seek compensation from the Pittsburgh Penguins after the disappearance of their best player, Evgeni Malkin.
